properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM POST WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , POST_TITLE , M_ID , M_NAME , POST_RECOMMEND , POST_DATE FROM POST JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_STATUS = 'U' ORDER BY POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
